item.name: Hente gyldig accesstoken med riktig scope

exec: pm.test("find element id for client_id ", function () {

body.raw:
{
    "client_name": "knut-oidc-test",
    "description": "Knut sin testklient oidc",
    "authorization_lifetime": 3600,
    "access_token_lifetime": 3600,
    "refresh_token_lifetime": 3600,
    "client_type": "PUBLIC",
    "token_reference": "OPAQUE",
    "refresh_token_usage": "ONETIME",
    "frontchannel_logout_session_required": false,
    "force_pkce": false,
    "client_id": "123456789",
    "client_orgno": null,
    "client_uri": "https://wwww.knut.no",
    "supplier_orgno": null,
    "active": false,
    "default_scopes": [],
    "logo_uri": "bilde.gif",
    "grant_types": ["urn:ietf:params:oauth:grant-type:jwt-bearer"],
    "last_updated": "2019-03-21T17:03:59.583+01:00",

}
